metadata.name: HAPEWIVES
metadata.description: HAPEWIVES IS A COLLECTION OF 8888 UNIQUELY GENERATED NFTS FROM OVER 300 TRAITS LIVING FASHIONABLY ON THE ETHEREUM BLOCKCHAIN. EACH HAPEWIFE IS A WORK OF ART INSPIRED BY POWERFUL AND INFLUENTIAL WOMEN FROM AROUND THE WORLD - ALL OF THEM ICONS AND TRENDMAKERS WITH DISTINCT PERSONALITIES.
